descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value:
This course meets for the duration of the fall quarter, and includes a mandatory class trip to Honolulu, Hawai?i the week before fall classes begin. The dates of the trip will be September 10-17, 2017, departing on the day of Sunday, September 10, and returning the following Sunday, September 17 (fall classes begin Tuesday, September 19). Please check your calendar to be sure that you are available to travel the week prior to fall classes before applying to this course!

Course enrollment is by application only. Application instructions are on the Kaplan Humanities Institute website: humanities.northwestern.edu/undergraduate.

NOTE: Applying to the course is a commitment to travel to Hawai?i.

*Because this trip overlaps with Wildcat Welcome and orientation, first year students are not eligible for this course.
